lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In response to more specific market rumors that it had taken action on its exposure to Brazil, Citicorp said it made an 8-K filing on the subject with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday in relation to a registration statement for a preferred stock issue.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Brazil's new central bank governor Francisco Gros met senior commercial bankers here on Wednesday and Citicorp said formal talks on Brazil's recent actions and future financing needs should begin in "the near future".

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. and one of the biggest lenders to Latin America, with some eight to nine billion dlrs outstanding to Brazil, Mexico and Argentina, bank analysts said.
